SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.managers

Interface MeasurementManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
MeasurementManagerImpl
public interface MeasurementManager
Service interface for high-level measurement operations in OpenO EMR. This manager provides business logic layer operations for clinical measurements, abstracting complex database operations and providing security-aware access to measurement data.

The MeasurementManager serves as the primary business service for:

  • Data retrieval: Security-aware measurement queries with proper authorization
  • Data creation: Adding new measurements with validation and audit trails
  • Integration support: Methods for measurement mapping and external system integration
  • Flowsheet management: Dynamic flowsheet generation and HTML template handling
  • Configuration management: Measurement-related property and setting management

All methods require LoggedInInfo for security context and audit logging, ensuring that measurement access is properly authenticated and authorized according to healthcare privacy requirements.

Common usage patterns:


 // Get measurements with security context
 List<Measurement> measurements = measurementManager.getMeasurementByType(
     loggedInInfo, demographicId, Arrays.asList("BP", "WT"));
 
 // Add new measurement with audit trail
 Measurement newMeasurement = new Measurement();
 // ... set measurement properties
 Measurement saved = measurementManager.addMeasurement(loggedInInfo, newMeasurement);
 
 // Get recent measurements for patient
 List<Measurement> recent = measurementManager.getMeasurementByDemographicIdAfter(
     loggedInInfo, demographicId, thirtyDaysAgo);
Since:
2006

  • Method Details

    • getCreatedAfterDate

      List<Measurement> getCreatedAfterDate(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo, Date updatedAfterThisDateExclusive, int itemsToReturn)
      Retrieves measurements created after a specific date with security authorization. Supports pagination for large datasets and incremental synchronization scenarios.
      Parameters:
      loggedInInfo - LoggedInInfo security context for authorization and audit
      updatedAfterThisDateExclusive - Date cutoff date (exclusive) for measurement creation
      itemsToReturn - int maximum number of measurements to return
      Returns:
      List measurements created after the specified date

    • getMeasurement

      Measurement getMeasurement(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo, Integer id)
      Retrieves a single measurement by ID with proper security authorization.
      Parameters:
      loggedInInfo - LoggedInInfo security context for authorization and audit
      id - Integer the measurement ID to retrieve
      Returns:
      Measurement the requested measurement, or null if not found or not authorized

    • getMeasurementByType

      List<Measurement> getMeasurementByType(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo, Integer id, List<String> types)
      Retrieves measurements of specific types for a patient with security authorization. Essential method for clinical workflows requiring specific measurement categories.
      Parameters:
      loggedInInfo - LoggedInInfo security context for authorization and audit
      id - Integer the patient's demographic ID
      types - List measurement type codes to retrieve (e.g., ["BP", "WT", "HT"])
      Returns:
      List measurements of the specified types for the patient

    • getMeasurementByDemographicIdAfter

      List<Measurement> getMeasurementByDemographicIdAfter(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo, Integer demographicId, Date updateAfter)
      Retrieves measurements for a patient updated after a specific date. Useful for tracking measurement changes and synchronization workflows.
      Parameters:
      loggedInInfo - LoggedInInfo security context for authorization and audit
      demographicId - Integer the patient's demographic ID
      updateAfter - Date cutoff date for measurement updates
      Returns:
      List measurements for the patient updated after the date

    • getMeasurementMaps

      List<MeasurementMap> getMeasurementMaps()
      Retrieves all measurement mapping configurations for laboratory integration. Returns mappings between internal measurement types and external codes (LOINC, etc.).
      Returns:
      List all configured measurement mappings

    • addMeasurement

      Measurement addMeasurement(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo, Measurement measurement)
      Adds a new measurement to the system with security validation and audit logging. Performs validation, authorization checks, and maintains audit trails.
      Parameters:
      loggedInInfo - LoggedInInfo security context for authorization and audit
      measurement - Measurement the measurement data to add
      Returns:
      Measurement the persisted measurement with generated ID and audit information
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if user lacks permission to add measurements for this patient

    • getMeasurementsByProgramProviderDemographicDate

      List<Measurement> getMeasurementsByProgramProviderDemographicDate(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo, Integer programId, String providerNo, Integer demographicId, Calendar updatedAfterThisDateExclusive, int itemsToReturn)

    • getDShtml

      String getDShtml(String groupName)
      Retrieves HTML template content for measurement flowsheet display groups. Used for dynamic flowsheet rendering based on measurement group configurations.
      Parameters:
      groupName - String the measurement group name to get HTML template for
      Returns:
      String HTML template content, or null if group not found

    • isProperty

      boolean isProperty(String prop)
      Checks if a measurement-related property exists in the system configuration.
      Parameters:
      prop - String the property name to check
      Returns:
      boolean true if the property exists, false otherwise

    • findGroupId

      String findGroupId(String groupName)
      Finds the internal ID for a measurement group by name. Used for measurement group management and flowsheet organization.
      Parameters:
      groupName - String the measurement group name
      Returns:
      String the group ID, or null if not found

    • addMeasurementGroupDS

      void addMeasurementGroupDS(String groupName, String dsHTML)
      Adds or updates HTML template for a measurement group. Used for customizing flowsheet displays and measurement presentations.
      Parameters:
      groupName - String the measurement group name
      dsHTML - String the HTML template content for the group

    • removeMeasurementGroupDS

      void removeMeasurementGroupDS(String propKey)
      Removes HTML template for a measurement group. Cleans up custom flowsheet configurations.
      Parameters:
      propKey - String the property key identifying the group template to remove

    • getLatestMeasurementsByDemographicIdObservedAfter

      List<Measurement> getLatestMeasurementsByDemographicIdObservedAfter(LoggedInInfo loggedInInfo, Integer demographicId, Date observedDate)
      Retrieves the latest measurements for a patient observed after a specific date. Returns the most recent measurement for each type, filtered by observation date.
      Parameters:
      loggedInInfo - LoggedInInfo security context for authorization and audit
      demographicId - Integer the patient's demographic ID
      observedDate - Date cutoff date for clinical observation (not system entry)
      Returns:
      List latest measurements observed after the specified date

    • getFlowsheetDsHTML

      static List<String> getFlowsheetDsHTML()
      Retrieves all available flowsheet HTML template files from the system. Scans both configured directories and default resource locations for templates.
      Returns:
      List list of available HTML template filenames

    • getPropertyValue

      static String getPropertyValue(String prop)
      Retrieves the value of a measurement-related system property. Provides access to configuration values stored in the properties system.
      Parameters:
      prop - String the property name to retrieve
      Returns:
      String the property value, or null if property not found
